edu.ucla.util
Interface ProgressMonitorable

All Known Implementing Classes:
CompoundTask, HuginReader, NodeLinearTask, Simulator, WeightedTask
public interface ProgressMonitorable

A task that estimates how much total work it must do and reports on how much it has completed so far. Implementations should try to estimate and report progress with the goal of making the pace a user sees as consistent as possible.

Since:
20060518
Author:
keith cascio
